arts.ttl: Thursday's Transfer Talk Update: Viktor Gyokeres, Leon Goretzka, Julian Alvarez
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: Barcelona, PSG Target’s Asking Price Revealed to Premier League Clubs
arts.sum: L’Equipe recently reported that Paris Saint-Germain are eager to sign a reliable No. 9, with Viktor Gyökeres being their top target. However, a mid-season move for him seems unlikely. Sporting Lisbon have made it clear that they won’t entertain offers for the striker, whose €100 million release clause remains intact, until at least next summer. […] The post Barcelona, PSG Target’s Asking Price Revealed to Premier League Clubs appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: Luis Enrique Speechless After Atlético Madrid’s Stunning Win Over PSG
arts.sum: Atlético de Madrid claimed a dramatic 2-1 victory over Paris Saint-Germain in their UEFA Champions League match on Wednesday night at the Parc des Princes, scoring twice without reply, including a last-minute goal in stoppage time. PSG took an early lead when Warren Zaïre-Emery found the back of the net in the 14th minute. However, […] The post Luis Enrique Speechless After Atlético Madrid’s Stunning Win Over PSG appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: Last-minute goal gives Atletico Madrid dramatic victory over struggling PSG
arts.sum: Watch highlights as a 93rd-minute goal from Angel Correa gives Atletico Madrid a dramatic 2-1 victory against a struggling Paris St-Germain who are without a win in their last three Champions League games.

arts.ttl: PSG’s Luis Enrique on Atlético Madrid’s late winner: “It was a joke in bad taste”
arts.sum: In the wake of his Paris Saint-Germain team’s second defeat in the Champions League this season – one that leaves them outside of the play-off places – Luis Enrique provided…

arts.ttl: Barcelona, Tottenham Target Identified as PSG’s Top Transfer Priority
arts.sum: In September, CaughtOffside reported that Chelsea, Tottenham Hotspur, and Paris Saint-Germain were all interested in Sporting Lisbon striker Viktor Gyökeres. Following his hat-trick against Manchester City on Tuesday, a former player highlighted what sets him apart as a standout forward. Tottenham are currently leading the chase for Gyökeres, while Chelsea see him as a backup […] The post Barcelona, Tottenham Target Identified as PSG’s Top Transfer Priority appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | PSG 1-2 Atlético Madrid: Dominant hosts undone by last-minute winner
arts.sum: Given they were on the verge of dropping out of the play-off spots at kick-off, Paris Saint-Germain were well aware that tonight’s clash against Atlético Madrid was a must-win encounter.…

arts.ttl: Marquinhos says struggling PSG has to 'do things properly' after another Champions League loss
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain captain Marquinhos lamented the team’s inefficiency and inability to “do things properly” after a 2-1 home loss to Atletico Madrid on Wednesday left it last among the four French clubs in the new-look Champions League . “You have to tell the truth, if we want to win games then we have to do things properly,” Marquinhos said in French.

arts.ttl: What kept Antoine Griezmann from joining PSG?
arts.sum: Antoine Griezmann (33) is one of the few prominent French footballers who has never played for a senior club side in France, despite the best efforts of Paris Saint-Germain. The…

arts.ttl: Watch: Atletico's Correa beats PSG with last kick of game
arts.sum: Angel Correa scores with the last kick of the game to snatch a dramatic 2-1 win for Atletico Madrid over PSG in the Champions League.
